author: USA TODAY, Jessica Flores, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: US death toll nears 13K; Los Angeles to require face masks; jubilant Wuhan, China marks end of lockdown
description: Coronavirus claims beloved singer John Prine. Wuhan celebrates lockdown end. Surgeon General Jerome Powell seems more optimistic. More news Wednesday.
content:
The U.S. coronavirus death toll neared 13,000 early Wednesday  less than 48 hours after cresting 10,000  amid contradicting comments from U.S. Surgeon General Jerome Adams about the deadly force of the virus.
While the coronavirus is inexplicably and disprop… [+8632 chars]
